page.title: 07SHANKLIN SEAFRONT
page.content: There are many attractions on Shanklin and Sandown seafronts.These include arcades and funfairs. Shanklin has a pleasantly situated putting and crazy golf course, and there are a number of beachwear and gift shops.There are adequate car parking facilities and conveniences.The lift which was completed in 1892 has been renovated and there is a small charge.It is situated on the cliff face and takes about a minute to go up and down. Shanklin town is at the top. The beach is a mixture of sand and pebbles and it stretches for about a mile.It is safe for bathing and other sea sports such as canoeing,bathing, windsurfing and fishing.The resorts are sheltered by cliffs.
